text: The 1923-24 Austrian Football Championship was the first organized by the Vienna Football Association and played by its members. The double-track second class served as a substructure to the first class. Other federal state associations organized state championships in different modes. The Wiener Amateur SV became Austrian football champions for the first time. Wiener AC and SC Rudolfshügel were promoted. ==Table== Pl. Name M W D L P 1\. Wiener Amateur SV 22 16 4 2 36 2\. First Vienna FC 22 14 4 4 32 3\. Wiener Sport-Club 22 11 8 3 30 4\. SK Rapid Wien 24 10 5 9 25 5\. 1. Simmeringer SC 22 9 7 6 25 6\. SC Hakoah Wien 22 8 6 6 22 7\. SK Admira Wien 22 7 7 8 21 8\. SC Wacker Wien 22 6 8 8 20 9\. SK Slovan Wien 22 7 4 11 18 10\. ASV Hertha Wien 22 4 9 9 17 11\. FC Ostmark 22 2 5 15 9 12\.
